Define Documentation

#define MLD   mld mld_
 

Just drop 'MLD' anywhere in your class definition to get cheap memory leak detection for your class.

#define MLD_COUNTER   mld::value()
 

Use 'MLD_COUNTER' in main() to see if things are OK.
